Introduction

Welcome to K-Task! This app is a simple task manager that allows you to create a task with a title, due date and time, and description. All of your open tasks will be added to the home screen for your viewing pleasure. Upon completion of a task, you can click the checkbox to mark the task as complete. You can also swipe the task to the right to edit it. 

Creating a Task

To create a new task, click the "+" symbol at the top of the home screen. This will take you to a screen that allows you to create your task. 

Saving a Task

To save a task, click the "Save" button when you are finished. This will save your task and take you back to the home screen. 

Editing a Task

To edit a task, swipe the task to the right. This can be done by placing your finger on the screen and sliding it to the right approximately 1/4 the size of the screen. When you pick up your finger, you will be taken to the screen to edit your task. 

Completing a Task

To mark a task as completed, click the checkbox next to the app. Your screen will be refreshed and only your active tasks will be displayed. 

Other Questions

If you have any other questions, please email us at ktask@gmail.com. Thank you for using our app. Enjoy! 


- The K-Task Team
